I provoke new insight through adventure and play.

  • Watch My Businessweek Design Talk

    I start out discussing of zombies and ended by having the whole audience taking each other's pulse.

  • Explore Patterns of Transformation

    What do sex parties, funerals, and wilderness trips have in common? More than you think. I'm creating a unified design guide for transformative social experiences.

  • Discover SYPartners

    SYPartners hired me as a "true maverick" with singular expertise in experiences design. I'm advancing their work to create large-scale positive impact on society through individual and organizational transformation.

  • Read About Sextantworks

    My previous design practice, Sextantworks, created experiences in places you aren't supposed to be. Read the coverage in Businessweek, The New Yorker, The New York Times, Fast Company, and NPR.
